title: Team Formation
description: Our journey begins with the formation of our enthusiastic team, bringing together a diverse group of designers, developers, and engineers passionate about innovation and transportation.

title: Ideation Phase
description: Brainstorming sessions kick off, generating a flurry of exciting and wacky ideas for the competition. From underground roller coasters to tunneling racecars, we explore the full spectrum of possibilities.

title: Concept Selection
description: After heated debates and careful consideration, we settle on a concept that combines sustainable urban transport with a touch of whimsy: an underground pneumatic tube system for transporting small goods and pets across the city.

title: Design Sprint
description: Our designers and engineers collaborate intensively to flesh out the concept. We create mockups, schematics, and even a scale model of our pneumatic tube network, affectionately named "PetPipes."

title: Prototype Development
description: With blueprints in hand, we dive into the development phase. Using state-of-the-art technology and a generous dose of duct tape, we construct a functional prototype of the PetPipes system.

title: Testing and Iteration
description: The prototype undergoes rigorous testing, revealing unexpected challenges like sneaky squirrels and mischievous cats. We make iterative improvements, enhancing both the safety and cuteness factors.

title: Public Sneak Peek
description: We offer the public a glimpse into our underground world with an interactive exhibit. Visitors get to send tiny test capsules through our mini PetPipes, generating excitement and media coverage.

title: Final Polishing
description: As the competition deadline looms, we put the finishing touches on our website and prepare our presentation materials. Our developers work tirelessly to ensure a seamless online experience.

title: Competition Submission
description: With bated breath, we submit our project to the Not-A-Boring Competition. Our website showcases the journey from wild idea to functional prototype, highlighting our creativity and determination.

title: Winner Announcement
description: The tension builds as we eagerly await the competition results. Regardless of the outcome, we're immensely proud of what we've accomplished and the bonds we've formed as a team.
